/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urban charm to the scene. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the rhythm of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape.
